hero.title: Discover Your Dream Home When You Buy House in Sector 99 Gurugram
description: Sector 99 stands as a pivotal residential destination along the highly sought-after Dwarka Expressway. If you are looking to buy house in Sector 99 Gurugram, you are investing in a future of unparalleled connectivity and rapid infrastructural appreciation. This micro-market offers a compelling mix of premium high-rise apartments and meticulously designed independent builder floors catering to diverse residential needs and investment goals.

We guide you through the finest housing options available, ensuring seamless transactions and maximizing the value of your real estate portfolio. Explore ready-to-move properties or high-potential under-construction projects that define modern, amenity-rich living standards right here in New Gurugram. Secure your position in one of the most promising sectors on the metropolitan fringe today.

featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Housing Options and Residential Property Configurations in Sector 99 Gurugram
description: Sector 99 provides a dynamic range of housing solutions, from compact luxury units ideal for young professionals to expansive independent houses perfect for large families. Understanding the configuration options is the first step toward finding your ideal property that meets both your lifestyle requirements and investment budget.

These feature categories represent the range of available inventory, whether you prefer a spacious villa or a highly efficient apartment layout along the booming Dwarka Expressway corridor. Our portfolio includes properties from top-tier developers guaranteeing quality and modern design standards.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot Equivalent
features.description: This configuration often translates into efficient and premium 2 BHK or smaller 3 BHK luxury apartments. These units are highly sought after by new families and investors due to their accessible price point and high rental yield potential. You benefit from modern amenities like clubhouses, dedicated parking, and integrated security systems, making it a safe and convenient place to buy house in Sector 99. The space optimization ensures maximum usability without compromising on the luxury feel.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot Equivalent
features.description: A popular choice for builder floors and standard 3 BHK apartments, properties built on this footprint offer a generous balance of space and affordability. These homes are ideal for mid-sized families needing three bedrooms and adequate common areas. Many builder floors in Sector 99 come with private terrace access and dedicated lift facilities, providing an independent living experience coupled with the advantages of a planned residential sector. This size represents excellent value for money in the Gurugram property market.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot Equivalent
features.description: These configurations accommodate larger 3 BHK units, often featuring a servant quarter, or spacious 4 BHK apartments in high-rise societies. For those looking for an independent house experience, this size allows for substantial ground floor coverage and multiple levels. When you buy house in Sector 99 at this scale, you are securing a substantial residential asset known for premium finishes and exclusive community access. It represents a significant step up in luxury and living area.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot Equivalent
features.description: This size is typically reserved for spacious 4 BHK apartments or independent villa-style residences. Homeowners at this level enjoy expansive living rooms, multiple balconies, and often bespoke interior customization options. Properties here prioritize privacy, space, and high-end specifications. Investing in a 10 Marla equivalent property in Sector 99 places you among the sector's most exclusive residential addresses, perfect for those seeking ultimate comfort and prestige near the Dwarka Expressway.

features.title: 12 Marla Plot Equivalent
features.description: Reserved for the most exclusive residential formats, including large duplex units or sprawling penthouses located within the elite projects of Sector 99 Gurugram. These homes offer breathtaking views, double-height ceilings, and private recreational spaces. Buying a house of this stature is an investment in unparalleled luxury living and a statement of status. Expect advanced home automation systems, dedicated security teams, and access to ultra-premium community amenities.

features.title: 14 Marla Plot Equivalent
features.description: These are the largest residential footprints available, primarily focused on bespoke luxury villas or highly customized integrated housing units. These properties provide maximum independence, large private gardens, and ample parking space. Such large formats are rare and highly prized, offering a unique opportunity to design a personalized mansion within a meticulously planned urban setting. Contact us for exclusive listings on these large format residential opportunities in Sector 99.

locationsSection.title: Key Connectivity Highlights Surrounding Sector 99 Gurugram
description: Sector 99 boasts a strategic location that positions it as a major connectivity hub in New Gurugram. Its direct access to the Dwarka Expressway ensures rapid travel to both Delhi and the established parts of Gurugram. This exceptional connectivity drastically cuts down commute times to major business districts and recreational areas.

The ongoing infrastructural improvements, including the completion of the expressway and related arterial roads, guarantee future appreciation and enhanced living convenience for residents. Below are the crucial locational advantages when you decide to buy house in Sector 99.

whyChoose.title: Why Sector 99 is the Perfect Location to Buy House in Gurugram
description: Choosing Sector 99 means selecting a dynamic community poised for significant growth. The sector offers the ideal blend of modern urban planning, essential amenities, and robust investment potential, distinguishing it from older, congested areas of the city. We highlight the core reasons why this location should be at the top of your residential search list.

The commitment to quality infrastructure development by both the government and leading private developers ensures a high quality of life and long-term security for your investment. This is where modern living meets future-proof infrastructure.

points.title: Strategic Dwarka Expressway Access
points.description: The primary advantage of Sector 99 is its direct and superior connectivity via the Dwarka Expressway. This ensures seamless and fast travel to Indira Gandhi International Airport and central Delhi business districts. Reduced travel time translates directly into a better work-life balance, making properties here highly desirable for NCR commuters who buy house in Sector 99.

points.title: Rapid Infrastructure Development
points.description: Sector 99 is benefiting from significant government focus on developing peripheral Gurugram. This includes wide sector roads, planned utility services, robust sewage treatment plants, and green initiatives. This proactive development minimizes future civic issues and ensures a planned, sustainable environment for all residents.

points.title: Investment Appreciation Potential
points.description: Due to its placement along the Dwarka Expressway corridor, property values in Sector 99 are forecast for strong, sustained appreciation. Early investment here provides excellent returns as the surrounding commercial and social infrastructure matures. Investing now means securing a substantial asset before the area reaches its peak valuation.

points.title: Availability of Premium Housing
points.description: The sector is home to projects by renowned developers such as Shapoorji Pallonji and others, offering world-class amenities, robust construction quality, and contemporary architectural designs. Whether you seek a luxurious high-rise apartment or an independent builder floor, the quality of construction here is consistently high.

points.title: Access to Quality Social Amenities
points.description: Future residents will enjoy immediate access to top-tier international schools, multispecialty hospitals, and major retail and entertainment hubs being developed nearby. Sector 99 ensures all essential services and lifestyle needs are met within a short radius, enhancing the convenience of daily life.

points.title: Well-Planned Green Spaces
points.description: Unlike older parts of the city, Sector 99 has been designed with an emphasis on open areas and green landscaping. Many residential projects feature internal parks, jogging tracks, and eco-friendly designs, promoting a healthier and more serene living environment away from urban congestion.

points.title: Clear Property Titles and RERA Compliance
points.description: Properties listed in Sector 99 are predominantly part of planned developments with clear titles and RERA registrations. This ensures transparency, minimizes legal risks, and provides peace of mind regarding the timely possession and legitimate ownership of your new house or apartment.

points.title: A Safe and Secure Community
points.description: Residential complexes in Sector 99 offer comprehensive multi-tier security systems, including controlled access points, 24/7 surveillance, and dedicated security personnel. This focus on safety creates a protected environment ideal for families, retirees, and young professionals.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a House in Sector 99 Gurugram
faqSection.description: We address the most common queries potential buyers have regarding property types, pricing, investment security, and future development prospects in this growing sector of Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the average price range if I decide to buy house in Sector 99 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing structure in Sector 99 is highly dependent on the property type, developer reputation, and proximity to the main Dwarka Expressway stretch. Generally, premium apartments start upwards of INR 1.5 Crore for a well-located 3 BHK unit. Builder floors offer competitive rates, often slightly lower per square foot than high-rise complexes, but they involve higher land costs. For accurate, real-time pricing and tailored investment advice, consulting our property experts is essential as the market here is appreciating rapidly. Prices are dynamic so prompt action is recommended.

faqs.question: Is Sector 99 primarily for high-rise apartments or independent builder floors
faqs.answer: Sector 99 is a mix-use residential area but is predominantly characterized by high-rise luxury apartment projects by major national developers. However, there are designated pockets within the sector and adjoining areas that offer premium independent builder floors, catering to those who prefer lower density living without extensive communal facilities. Buyers can find both options, offering versatility in their search to buy house in Sector 99 based on their preference for lifestyle and community structure.

faqs.question: How far is Sector 99 from the main business hubs of Gurugram Cyber Hub and Golf Course Road
faqs.answer: Sector 99 enjoys excellent connectivity thanks to the Dwarka Expressway and access to the Central Peripheral Road. While it is located in New Gurugram, Cyber Hub and Golf Course Road are typically reachable within 30 to 45 minutes by car, depending on traffic conditions. The continuous improvement of the road network is designed to further reduce these commute times, making it a viable residential choice for professionals working across Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the investment potential of buying property here compared to other sectors
faqs.answer: The investment potential in Sector 99 is considered exceptionally high due to the macro infrastructure push provided by the Dwarka Expressway. It is a key growth corridor. Properties here are expected to provide superior returns compared to saturated, established sectors where appreciation has plateaued. The presence of reputable developers and planned social infrastructure ensures sustained demand and excellent long-term capital growth.

faqs.question: Are the projects in Sector 99 RERA registered and safe for investment
faqs.answer: Yes, almost all established and reputable residential projects in Sector 99 are mandated to be RERA registered. We exclusively deal with RERA-compliant properties ensuring complete transactional transparency, secure deposits, and adherence to committed completion timelines. We advise all clients to verify the RERA status of any project before finalizing their decision to buy house in Sector 99.

faqs.question: What type of social infrastructure is currently operational near Sector 99
faqs.answer: While the sector itself is still developing, the surrounding areas of New Gurugram already have operational schools, hospitals, and retail complexes. Reputed educational institutions and major healthcare facilities are within a 10 to 15-minute drive. As residents move in, the internal commercial clusters within the sector projects are rapidly becoming operational, providing essential services right at the doorstep.

faqs.question: Can foreign nationals or NRIs buy residential property in Sector 99 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals and Non-Resident Indians NRIs are legally permitted to buy residential property in India, including apartments and houses in Sector 99 Gurugram. There are specific regulatory guidelines under FEMA Foreign Exchange Management Act that must be followed regarding payment methods and repatriation of funds. Our legal and financial team specializes in assisting NRIs with seamless transactions and understanding all regulatory requirements.

faqs.question: Is water supply and electricity infrastructure reliable in this developing sector
faqs.answer: The major residential projects in Sector 99 are built with robust, modern infrastructure planning. This typically includes dedicated power backup systems, ensuring uninterrupted electricity supply. Water supply is managed through a combination of civic pipelines and internal treatment plants, designed to meet the demands of the large residential populace. Reliability is a key focus area for developers in this new corridor.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes available for 3 BHK apartments in Sector 99
faqs.answer: The sizes for 3 BHK apartments in Sector 99 can vary significantly based on the project type and the developer's design philosophy. Generally, you can expect carpet areas ranging from approximately 1300 sq ft to 1800 sq ft for standard 3 BHK units. Premium or larger 3 BHK units that include a servant room often exceed 2000 sq ft. This wide range allows buyers to choose a layout that perfectly matches their spatial needs.

faqs.question: Are there good rental income opportunities if I buy house in Sector 99 for investment purposes
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 99 offers strong rental income prospects, driven by its superb connectivity to major job hubs and the airport. The demand for quality rental housing is high, particularly for well-maintained, amenity-rich 2 BHK and 3 BHK units. Once the Dwarka Expressway is fully operational and the surrounding commercial centers are complete, rental yields are expected to stabilize at competitive rates, making it an excellent location for passive income generation.
